title: Pancho Villa: El Centauro del Norte
overview: This is the story of Doroteo Arango, Francisco Villa, from his beginnings in banditry when he was very young, until his death in an ambush, and portrays the dark Villa, since he was a vandal, his controversial personality that led him to be General Pancho Villa, the Centauro del Norte y sus Dorados, the anti-hero who redeems himself, partly a fiction that he himself paid for and his role in the history of the Revolution. Villa generated hate and love, contempt and respect.
